Entries.default: "I'm going, I'm going!"
"Hey, don't worry. I'm keeping out of trouble."
[Attack] "You're next. It's nothing personal."
"Hello. I'm the one who's going to cut your throat if I catch you anywhere near the Bardatto house."
"The Bardattos know about the plan, and this is your one chance to quit while you're ahead."
"Wait, what? No!" She gathers up a weapon to defend herself.

"This job? I'm out. It never happened." 

She slaps her palms in a dismissive fashion and holds them out to you.

"You... you killed him! Let me go and I won't say a word about what happened here."

Persa's voice quavers fearfully, and she's rooted to the spot as if paralyzed.
"Relax. What's your part in the Bardatto job? You're clearly not muscle."
"Get out of here."
"Belda's plan was for everyone to converge on the Bardatto vault."
"You won't find me anywhere near the Bardatto fortune. Can we agree that that's worth sparing my life?"
"I... I think that would be best as well. Consider me gone."
"I just check for traps. Belda and her crew are the vault crackers - not my line of work."
"You killed Baer and call yourself... Eccosi, I'm just having a hard time wrapping my head around that one."
"The Bardattos sent you, right? No need to kill me over a family tiff, eh?"
"Give me every coin you have and I'll let you live."

"Deal! If I can just find that damned pouch..."

Persa curses and mutters to herself as she furiously digs through her pockets, finally producing a sum of coins that she flings across the gap toward you.
"She has little to gain and much to lose from crossing you. Show mercy, Watcher."
"Yes - per complanca, show mercy!"
